description: Identifies silent or implicit concessions where an author's response tacitly abandons or weakens positions from their original work without acknowledgment.
researcher_question: Where does the author silently concede ground without admitting it?

concessions.what_is_conceded: string - what ground has been given up
concessions.trigger: string - what critique prompted this concession

extraction.core_question: Where does the author silently concede ground without admitting it?
extraction_steps: IDENTIFY ORIGINAL STRONG CLAIMS: Find bold positions in original work
TRACE IN RESPONSE: Find how these claims appear (or don't) in response
DETECT WEAKENING: Note qualifications, scope reductions, or absences
IDENTIFY TRIGGER: Determine what critique prompted the concession
ASSESS ACKNOWLEDGMENT: Note whether concession is admitted
extraction.special_instructions: The most valuable findings are unacknowledged concessions - where the author gives ground while claiming consistency.
